item.title: !Hard TUT! Restore pots!
item.dc:creator: @motherload11 motherload11
item.description:
@motherload11 wrote:

Yeah ok I got restore potions working! this is like real rs2…replaces vial with vial ect…

This is for people who know alot of java (who knows where this code goes) put somewhere near the prayer code you guys have! (not telling exactly where because my client.java is way different lol):

else if ((buryItem-1) == 3024) //super restore(4) start super restore pot { sendMessage("You drink the super restore Pot!"); actionTimer = 5; pEmote = 829; deleteItem(3024, getItemSlot(3024), 1); addItem(3026,1); currentHealth += 16; if(currentHealth > maxHealth) currentHealth = maxHealth; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if ((buryItem-1) == 3026) //super restore(3) { sendMessage("You drink the super restore Pot!"); actionTimer = 5; pEmote = 829; deleteItem(3026, getItemSlot(3026), 1); addItem(3028,1); currentHealth += 16; if(currentHealth > maxHealth) currentHealth = maxHealth; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if ((buryItem-1) == 3028) //super restore(2) { sendMessage("You drink the super restore Pot!"); actionTimer = 5; pEmote = 829; deleteItem(3028, getItemSlot(3028), 1); addItem(3030,1); currentHealth += 16; if(currentHealth > maxHealth) currentHealth = maxHealth; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if ((buryItem-1) == 3030) //super restore(1) { sendMessage("You drink the super restore Pot!"); actionTimer = 5; pEmote = 829; deleteItem(3030, getItemSlot(3030), 1); addItem(229,1); currentHealth += 16; if(currentHealth > maxHealth) currentHealth = maxHealth; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } //end super restore.
that will give you the whole restore pot code! lol (only works for health sorry lol)
credits go to me lol

[move] mother load11[/move]

Read full topic
